alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 8:09PM CST until February 03 at 1:48AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Leroy affecting Clarke and Washington Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Leroy. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday evening and continue falling to 20.1 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
